references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the high-resolution image synthesis method with latent diffusion model, which is foundational to the paper's multi-view video diffusion model.
This paper introduces video diffusion models, which are essential to the paper's multi-view video diffusion model and 4D content generation.
This paper introduces the Dreamfusion method to generate 3D content from text using 2D diffusion, providing a foundational method for 3D content generation used in this paper.
This paper introduces a multi-view diffusion model for 3D generation, which directly inspired the design of the paper's multi-view video diffusion model.

references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces the 3D Gaussian splatting method for real-time rendering, which is adopted in this paper for efficient 3D object representation and animation.
